name: GoPro Webcam additions, Hero9 support
body: Big thanks to GoPro for supplying the cam. Adds support for Webcam mode (GoPro Connect). See examples folder for usage.

name: Support for MAX 360 camera
body:
Support for some of MAX features added, still need to find a way to interface with the BLE API from the camera in a way that works across all OSes. Media-specific fixes coming in v4.1.0 .

Putting it out there, anyone willing to donate or sell me for cheap a HERO3 (Black)?

name: Big refactor - more to come
body: Big refactor

name: Contributor release
body:
- https://github.com/KonradIT/gopro-py-api/commit/fdaeab77bbbc161dcc282991cf79169af4e39ce2
- https://github.com/KonradIT/gopro-py-api/commit/69762de36e58a009ffc6168425bfebb0319039b1

name: Minor fixes and improvements
body:
Minor fixes and improvements.

- fix listMedia()

name: GoPro Fusion support
body: Now official, thanks to GoPro for providing one.

name: Fusion support
body: Now supports Fusion and HERO7.

name: Added TimeLapse Video intervals
body: Added TimeLapse Video intervals

name: Fixed typo and change hardcoded IP
body:
I'm away for a trip but released the pull requests on this release.
See diff between today and 19 days ago for changes.
I am also making a test server to work with the Travisci integration so I can release and have the code tested (flake8, etc... As well as syntax bugs and HTTP request).

name: Bug fix in changeWifiSettings()
body: Thanks to @maximedb who pushed this PR: https://github.com/KonradIT/gopro-py-api/pull/43

- add pair function for HERO 5, HERO 6 by using usepin=False - add changeWiFiSettings() function to change SSID and password on HERO 4 cameras. HERO 5 and 6 allow for changing SSID only. Stay tuned for future commits and releases as I will start adding bluetooth communication for waking up camera, start recording, etc...

name: Thanks Hacker News
body:
Got a lot of stars from HN... lol

- fixed error regarding ssl context
- fixed hero3 getStatus

name: Better HERO5 Session support thanks to @fredrikfalkman
body:
Huge thanks to @fredrikfalkman who lend me his HERO5 Session!!

This update adds:
- Support for pairing right off the bat, use GoProCamera.GoPro(constants.pair) to start pairing with your camera.
- Support for HERO5 Session resolutions
- Support for HERO5 Session connectivity

name: _TESTING_: GoPro Fusion pre-release
body: This is a release meant for testing the downloadLastSpherical function for GoPro Fusion. Also fixes quite a number of bugs reported and pushed by users.

name: HERO6 Bug fixes and additions
body: Changes will follow up shortly.

name: HERO5 bugfix
body: Fixed the never ending connection bug with HERO5 Black cameras.

name: Clip
body: This release adds the clip feature, this allows you to extract a clip from a video. It also allows you to change resolution and fps

name: Add stream settings
body:
You can now set the resolution and bit-rate of the stream:

```python
gopro.streamSettings(constants.Stream.BitRate.B4Mbps, constants.Stream.WindowSize.R720) #For HERO5 only!
```

even directly in ```stream()```:

```python
gopro.stream("...","high") #high/medium/low
```

name: Minor bug fix in deleteFile
body: Minor bug fix in deleteFile

name: Pairing camera
body:
- Adds pairing feature for HERO4 and HERO5, so you don't need to use the GoPro Capture App at all!
- Fixes reset option

name: HERO5 improvements
body:
- HERO5 improvements
- Streaming options
- Wifi options

name: OpenCV improvements
body: OpenCV improvements

name: Fix power on bug
body: Power on has now been fixed in this release.

name: HERO3/HERO4 Session improvements
body:
- Fixed HERO4 Session storage bug
- Fixed HERO3 bugs

name: First version
body: Currently has all of the features needed.
